name.japanese: エニエスロビー裁判所

description: A massive courthouse building on the southeast corner of Enies Lobby island, serving as the World Government's judicial center. The building has multiple levels and is where the Three-Headed Judge Baskerville presides.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Enter the Courthouse
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates successfully breach the entrance and begin advancing through the courthouse toward the roof.
keyEvents.significance: Major battle location for the Enies Lobby arc's climax.

keyEvents.title: Three-Headed Judge Confrontation
keyEvents.description: Baskerville attempts to assert his judicial authority over the invading pirates but is ignored and held back by the Franky Family.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the Straw Hats completely disregarding World Government authority.

trivia: The courthouse represents the World Government's judicial authority and is considered a sacred place of judgment.
The building has staircases that the Straw Hats climb to reach the upper levels and roof.

name.japanese: エニエスロビー裁判所屋上

description: The roof of the Enies Lobby courthouse, where Luffy confronts and battles CP9 agent Blueno. The location provides a dramatic setting with views across Enies Lobby island.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Blueno Battle
keyEvents.description: Luffy reaches the courthouse roof and engages in battle with Blueno, eventually using Gear Second to decisively defeat him.
keyEvents.significance: The location of Luffy's first major CP9 victory and the full combat debut of Gear Second.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Shouts to Robin
keyEvents.description: After defeating Blueno, Luffy yells Robin's name from the courthouse roof, his voice echoing across Enies Lobby to reach her.
keyEvents.significance: Emotional moment where Luffy reassures Robin he's coming to save her.

trivia: This rooftop serves as an important battle location during the Enies Lobby arc.
From this vantage point, voices can carry across much of Enies Lobby island.

description: A judicial island in the Grand Line under the World Government's control, known as the 'Island of Justice.' It features perpetual daytime due to unique lighting conditions and serves as a gateway to Impel Down and Marine Headquarters.

keyEvents.title: Continued Invasion
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats and their allies continue their invasion of Enies Lobby, fighting through the courthouse toward Robin.
keyEvents.significance: Central location for the arc's climactic battles.

trivia: Enies Lobby is one of the three major World Government strongholds, along with Impel Down and Marine Headquarters.
The island is connected to both Impel Down and Marine Headquarters via the Gates of Justice.
